Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server

Class Room

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.Observable<EventForServer>
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<EventForClient>, RoomObserver, java.lang.Runnable
public class Room
extends Observable<EventForServer>
implements java.lang.Runnable, RoomObserver
This class represents the container which has: the controller and the model of one game, and the references to the ServerInterface which represent the clients
Author:
Luca Giacometti

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Room​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nick, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ServerInterface> map)
    Constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void run()
    Here the game is started and the room is continuing sleeping until the end of the game or a disconnection of a player.
    void setGame​(Game game)
    This methods admits to put the game controller inside this room and to set it as an observer of the room
    void update​(EventForClient message)
    With this method the notifications are send to the client/s accessing to the map which contains the references.
    void update​(Disconnection disconnection)
    This update creates a Disconnection event for each client still alive and sets the condition to stop this thread

    Methods inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.utility.Observable

    addObserver, copyObservers, notify, removeObserver

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> nick, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ServerInterface> map)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      nick - the list of the nicknames of the player in this room
      map - the association between the nickname and the server interface which the client is using

  • Method Details

    • setGame

      public void setGame​(Game game)
      This methods admits to put the game controller inside this room and to set it as an observer of the room
      Parameters:
      game - the controller of the game

    • update

      public void update​(EventForClient message)
      With this method the notifications are send to the client/s accessing to the map which contains the references. And if the game is finished, it is captured here and the room turns down himself
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<EventForClient>
      Parameters:
      message - the event which has to be send to client/s

    • run

      public void run()
      Here the game is started and the room is continuing sleeping until the end of the game or a disconnection of a player. After it all the ServerInterface are closed
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • update

      public void update​(Disconnection disconnection)
      This update creates a Disconnection event for each client still alive and sets the condition to stop this thread
      Specified by:
      update in interface RoomObserver
      Parameters:
      disconnection - the event which contains the nickname of the player which is disconnected by the game
